site.name: Old Crown
site.title: Old Crown - Authentic Nepalese Cuisine & Pub Classics
site.description: Experience the finest Nepalese cuisine and traditional British pub food at Old Crown. Book your table today for an unforgettable dining experience.

hero.title: Welcome to Old Crown
hero.subtitle: Authentic Nepalese Cuisine & Traditional Pub Classics
hero.description: Experience the rich flavors of Nepal combined with traditional British pub food in our cozy, welcoming restaurant. Perfect for family dinners, romantic evenings, or drinks with friends.

hero.title: What's On & Community Events
hero.subtitle: Experience Girton pub culture ‚Äî lively quiz nights, Nepalese sharing plates, and big-screen sports. Call to reserve or enquire about group space.
hero.description: Discover local pub nights rooted in Girton village life: expect warm welcomes, proper pints, authentic Nepalese dishes to share, and the best place to catch live sports in Cambridge.

regularEvents.title: Seasonal Garden Social

contact.title: Book Your Event
contact.description: Planning a private event? Get in touch to discuss your requirements.

hero.title: Our Menu: Authentic Nepalese & Traditional British Cuisine
hero.subtitle: Discover the unique flavors of Nepal alongside your favorite pub classics at Girton's historic thatched pub. Every dish made fresh with authentic recipes and quality ingredients.

sections.description: Experience the perfect fusion of authentic Nepalese flavors and beloved British pub classics.
sections.allergenNotice: Please inform us of any allergies or dietary requirements when ordering.

items.name: Amelia Hart
items.text: If you're planning Sunday lunch Girton families will love, The Old Crown is our go-to. The largest thatched pub in the country feels properly historic, staff are warm, and portions are generous. Kids run off energy in the expansive garden and terrace while we relax. The Nepalese specials are full of flavor, and roasts are spot on. Free pub parking behind the building makes it easy for multi-generational meetups.

items.name: Tom Evans
items.text: Found the winner among pubs near Girton College. The Old Crown shows live sport, serves proper pints, and the Nepalese menu is affordable for student budgets. We cycle over via the path off Huntingdon Road, lock up easily, and grab Nepalese takeaway when revision runs late. Friendly staff and a big garden make it an easy hangout before heading back to halls.

items.question: Do you accept bookings?
items.answer: Yes, we accept bookings online or by phone. We recommend booking in advance, especially for weekends and special events.

items.question: Are you family-friendly?
items.answer: Absolutely! We welcome families with children until 9pm. We have a children's menu and high chairs available.
